body.name: MCQ Office Computer Desk Chair, Gaming Chairs for Adults, High-Back Mesh Rolling Swivel Reclining Chairs with Wheels, Comfortable Lumbar Support, Comfy Arms for Home, Office, Gaming, Student, Green
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 6 hrs 6 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Ergonomic Design】Office chair have ergonomic high back design, which has applied breathable and heat dissipating function. High-density sponge filled cushion is soft and not to be out of shape. A padded lumbar pillow is added to our computer chair to help relieving pressure on your lower back.

【Multi-Function Adjustable】This desk chair for adults could be easily adjusted by the pneumatic gas cylinder that rises and lowers smoothly and silently. Push the lever up and down to lock or unlock the backrest, available for 90-135 degrees of tilt. The headrest of the gamer chair can also be adjusted up and down, back and forth.

【Comfortable Sitting Experience】The reclining computer chair with retractable footrest. You can achieve the most comfortable sitting experience by adjust backrest and headrest combined with foot rest. These features allow you to have a pleasant experience and relax your mood while playing games, reading, and resting.

【Stable & Secure structure】Our high back swivel computer chair with 5-point base uses the same material as the built-in metal frame. The strong 5-point base ensures excellent durability and stability with the maximum weight up to 275 lbs. Featuring a high-quality 360-degree swivel caste, this rolling desk chair allows you to run smoothly as you want, whether on wooden floors, carpets or other flooring.

【Easy Assembly】The gaming chair includes an installation manual and necessary tools in the package. You can assemble according to the instructions. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable Headrest When resting or relaxing, the headrest can be adjusted to the appropriate position, providing better body support and relaxation. Super Comfy Armrest High-quality padded material reduces painfrom the users arms for hours working. Retractable Footrest Relax your legs and take a break by enjoying a nap or getting some work done without any discomfort. Convenient to store away when not being used. Height Adjustable Pull up the handle to accommodate height from 18.75'' to 22.75''.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this chair it goes well with my modern office setup. The foot rest and recline feature is amazing (I have fallen asleep many times in this chair) this product is a great value and a must buy. Assembly is super easy only took me about 10 minutes to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable, adjustable, easy to put together!
reviews.reviewText: This is such a great chair for the price. It’s so comfortable if you lean the back further back than it comes. It’s really sturdy and awesome to game and lounge in. I 100% recommend it. Cat approved, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding luxury tilt, twirl, foot rest chair
reviews.reviewText: Read the instructions first. The instructions correlate directly to how the items are packed in the box! No shuffling around. It's packed accordingly. Love the color! (green) The tool is supplied. Easy to assemble even though some parts are a little heavy. OUTSTANDING comfort and luxury. A foot rest?! FABULOUS upgrade!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable chair with quick assembly.
reviews.reviewText: The chair is really comfortable and feels sturdy. It took me about 30 minutes to put it together. I really like that you can recline it and lock the back in place. The only issue I had was, the back piece that covers the plate and screws was EXTREMELY hard to put on and it still doesn’t look like it’s on all the way. The top part of it will click in then you go to click the bottom part on and it pops off the top and it’s just a back and forth fight trying to get it to stay on. Other than that little thing, no other issues. I got the blue and it’s just as cute in person as it is online. It was a good price as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great chair easy assembly and quite comfortable and the footrest is just a plus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is a larger and thicker chair than I expected, it is very comfortable in the sitting area and the back fits perfectly on your waist. In my opinion, the only downside is that no matter how you put the lumbar support pillow, it does not stay in place because there is no place to attach it. It is a price-performance product and is also very easy to install. Instead of wasting hundreds of dollars on buying a faux leather sofa and sweating while using it, I think it was a good idea to buy a sofa with a nice fabric like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality, Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: The chair came earlier than expected, and it was pretty easy to put together. Some parts do require a little muscle to snap together. But it’s comfortable, and I love how adjustable it is. You can move the back of the chair, the headrest, and the height. Pleasantly surprised by how much I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Missing Lumbar Cushion
reviews.reviewText: I LOVEEE this chair, I’m only not giving 5 stars because it is missing the lumbar support cushion. I reached out to the buyer via the “return or missing items” tab, so if they can send the lumbar cushion I absolutely will give this 5/5 stars!!!It’s heavy enough that I wont fall over, mesh fabrication is nice, wheels are smooth and neck support is awesome. Raising the seat is super easy and adjusting the back forward and backward is seamless.I really hope they can send me the part that was missing. I noticed on the outside of the box it said “because of you this product has another chance” so I’m wondering if someone already had this?
